Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Bendine Way, east of the Oceancrest Municipal Library.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Municipal Library provides the northern section of town with a number of historical, scientific and magical references dating back nearly two hundred years, if not more. On the east side of the road is the Red-Eye Bar and Grill Stage, where a number of young bards go to practice their routines.
